forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning emerges with a crisp clarity, as the sun stretches its beams across the city, illuminating the iconic contours that define its skyline. The temperature lingers near a delightful 70 degrees, promising to slip to a comfortable 66 as the afternoon unfolds. While the west-southwest breezes carry a gentle vigor of 8 to 18 mph, one might feel a playful tug—a reminder of the ocean’s presence, enticing the curious to step outside and embrace the day.

As the sun ascends, a veil of clouds begins to weave itself through the scene, hinting at a slight overcast that will accompany the evening. The low will settle into the comforting embrace of 59 degrees, inviting those who venture out to don a light sweater or jacket, particularly as the winds dance playfully through the streets. The day's beauty beckons a stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a visit to the cafes where one can indulge in warm pastries while watching the world meander by. With the chance of the marine layer lingered in the distance, it remains a fine day to explore the vibrant pulse of the city, devoid of fog but abundant in freshness.
